name: Kent Grand+ RO (New Edition)
summary: Agar aapka TDS 1000 se upar hai, toh ye best option hai. Maintenance thoda mehenga hai, lekin paani ka taste sabse consistent hai.
pros: UV light in tank keeps water bacteria-free
cons: Annual filter change cost is high (~₹4000)

name: Coway AirMega 150
summary: Simple, no-nonsense purifier. Koi fancy wifi features nahi hain, bas solid cleaning performance hai. Filters khud saaf kiye ja sakte hain.
